attributes.action: We MUST fund schemes to stop the funding of schemes that consider vegetarianism a serious solution to world hunger.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that the idea to even "consider" that vegetarianism as a solution is the most idiotic idea ever!
We have been eating meat for god knows how long and I'll be damned if i stop now!
(I deeply respect a vegetarians choice to be a vegetarian but i just cannot take this idea seriously, its like it was thought out by a moronic French 16 year old, which it was)

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
